summary.body: For those who delight in the majestic silhouette of the Canada Goose rejoice they have arrived yet again. This time being the friendly rascals they have proven to be they picked up three more hitch hikers along the way and now number FIVE! For those who live beneath their flight path, they arrive from somewhere each morning usually from 4 A.M. onward, the day is lengthened whether we want the change or not. Five geese looking for nesting sites, places to graze, loo facilities and practicing their scales from long before daylight once again have a cross to bear.          The Corporation for years has turned it's collective back on complaints from residents but I suppose it's explained away by those who make up the committees who govern us by living far away and out of range of the problem!           Gads am I being overly critical here?
summary.subject: The blinkin geese are back!
